USER: Username or email has already taken
PWD_VALIDATION: Your password must be at least 8 characters long, a mixture of numbers and letters and contain a mix of upper/lower case letters

ERROR.minlength_username: Username must be at least 2 characters long
ERROR.pattern_password: Your password must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase, and one number
ERROR.minlength_password: Password must be at least 8 characters long

LANDING.title: PANIC CONTROLs your web site
LANDING.description: Downtime happens. We want you to be alerted first!
LANDING.button_title: Start monitoring in 30 seconds and totally free
LANDING.monitoring_description: Panic Control monitors your webpages and check whether they are up or down. This check uptime is highly configurable.
LANDING.alerting_description: If your website goes down, don't worry, an email is sent to alert you and your team. You can add multiple contacts to send alerts. we offer you en email  alert template, but you can create also your own template!
LANDING.stats_description: Downtime in production are irreversible and you want to have a report of your incidents, panic control do that for you, you will be able to view your  incidents over a month and over a year
LANDING.contact_text: Feel free to send a support request to panic.control.all@gmail.com (from the  account e-mail) and we'll be replying soon.

MONITORS.name: Name
MONITORS.stats_info_text: Here you can find the latest events of the month of all the monitors, for individual statistics, go to the specific monitor's
MONITORS.latest_text: It was recorded for the monitor {{monitor}} on this date: {{date}}  and the downtime lasted unknown time.

MONITOR.info_tooltip: Name must be unique, choose a friendly name
MONITOR.ws_tooltip: Url must be valid and http(s) only
MONITOR.conf_tooltip: Ping Timeout in seconds after which a request is considered failed and interval is the frequency of uptime tests
MONITOR.alert_tooltip: Custom email template is a choice, check default template

DOWNTIME.title: Downtime stats for
DOWNTIME.rapport: Report of downtime events since the creation of the monitor
